description: Hokkaido-born caf√© Tsubaki Salon serves fresh pancakes and this is the only store in Taiwan. Although this branch is not as elegant as the Ginza store, you can still enjoy their beautiful tableware and Hokkaido items. Please be patient, as the chef spends around 20 minutes preparing your pancake.
address: B2, No. 3, Lane 39, Section 2, Zhongshan N Rd, Zhongshan District, Taipei City 104

product1.description:
Basic toppings: Hokkaido Fresh Cream, Beet Syrup
Optional Toppings: TOKACHI Red Bean, Cultured Butter, Hokkaido Cheese
Choosing two out of three toppings is NT$400, and choosing all three toppings is NT$430.
product1.name: Hokkaido Hotcake Premium
